channel.title: Debt Elimination on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Debt Elimination on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: Negotiate Your APR: Scripts and Steps That Actually Work
item.description: When to call your credit card company. Exact scripts for APR negotiation. Hardship programs explained. What to do if they say no. Real example: negotiated from 18.5% to 14.2% in one call.

item.title: Avalanche vs Snowball: Which Debt Payoff Method Actually Works for You
item.description: Math comparison of debt payoff methods with real numbers and timelines. Why psychology matters more than optimization. How to choose based on your personality.
